r.s: SQL database XML definition tool for DDL creation and differencing
r.d:
Database DDL generation for creation or upgrade of an existing database with a "DDL compiler" approach.
Database upgrade DDL is generated from source XML, without connecting to the target database.
http://dbsteward.org/
r.n:
DBSteward 1.3.0 Release
* API Updates: - Format handler PHP fatals when certain CLI combos are used - Data row differencing when pkeys change in the same release - Addendum artifact creation mode - Allow definitions to contain sqlformat hints for platform specific definitions - refactor slony definition elements, make slony elements not required (see --generateslonik) * pgsql8 updates: - Index quoting fixes - slony replica set management expansion * mysql5 updates: - Index and column quoting fixes
Supported Platform DDL Generation and Differencing: * pgsql8 - PostgreSQL 8 * mssql10 - Microsoft SQL Server 2008 * mysql5 - MySQL 5
Supported Platform Structure Extraction into XML: * pgsql8 - PostgreSQL 8 * mysql5 - MySQL 5
